amendment.description: Amendment increases the penalty for document fraud; and imposes a mandatory minimum sentence on any illegal alien convicted of either a crime of violence or a drug trafficking offense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 109-350 to increase penalties for document fraud and for crimes of violence and drug trafficking offenses committed by illegal aliens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Shadegg.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
